item.title: Apple Granted Patent For Adaptive Keyboards
item.author: James Evans
item.description:
In a post to Slashdot, msmash states:

Apple is researching keyboards with small displays on the keys to dynamically change the label on each key, according to a newly-granted patent filing.

I donâ€™t care much for the touch bar but this would be useful. I would like the ability to change my keyboard layout and actually see the keys remap. It could also be beneficial if the keys mapped differently for different operating systems and/or programs.
